item.title: 关税威胁下，H&M 加速向地区供应链转型
item.description: 瑞典快速时尚零售商H&M公司财务总监周四告诉路透社，该公司正努力从更靠近其欧洲和美国主要市场的供应商那里购买更多的服装和配饰，部分原因是为了应对美国可能征收的进口关税。【原文：Swedish fast-fashion retailer H&M is working to buy more of its clothes and accessories from suppliers closer to its key markets in Europe and the U.S., its finance chief told Reuters on Thursday, in part to prepare for potential U.S. import tariffs.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金在市场受挫的情况下仍坚持可再生能源投资
item.description: 挪威的1.8万亿美元财富基金是世界上最大的财富基金，该基金的一位高级官员周四表示，尽管近期市场遭遇挫折，但该基金仍将致力于可再生资产投资，并将在上市市场和私人市场寻找机会。【原文：Norway's $1.8 trillion wealth fund, the world's largest, remains committed to investments in renewable assets despite recent market setbacks and will seek opportunities in both the listed and private markets, a senior fund official said on Thursday.】

item.title: 邪恶 "助推康卡斯特收入强劲，缓冲宽带用户损失
item.description: 康卡斯特（Comcast）周四公布的第四季度营收超过预期，原因是包括《邪恶》（Wicked）在内的假日大片的上映弥补了宽带用户人数的下降，但下降幅度超出预期。【原文：Comcast surpassed fourth-quarter revenue estimates on Thursday as blockbuster holiday releases, including "Wicked", more than made up for a larger-than-expected decline in broadband customers.】

item.title: 尽管 DeepSeek 兴起，ABB 首席执行官仍看好数据中心业务的增长
item.description: ABB 首席执行官莫滕-维罗德（Morten Wierod）周四表示，尽管中国的 DeepSeek 公司有望推出能耗更低的人工智能模型，但 ABB 预计数据中心市场对其电气化产品的需求将会增加。【原文：ABB expects increased demand from the data centre market for its electrification products, CEO Morten Wierod said on Thursday, despite the promise of lower-energy AI models from China's DeepSeek.】

item.title: 由于中国市场对其自动驾驶技术的需求疲软，Mobileye 的年收入低于预期目标
item.description: Mobileye Global 周四预测 2025 财年营收低于华尔街预期，预计其辅助驾驶技术在中国的出货量将减少，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌超过 12%。【原文：Mobileye Global forecast fiscal 2025 revenue below Wall Street expectations on Thursday, anticipating fewer shipments of its assisted driving technology to China, sending its shares down more than 12% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 机器人出租车失败后，通用汽车将软件赌注转向驾驶员辅助系统
item.description: 通用汽车公司正在规划一个以超级巡航驾驶辅助技术为核心的技术未来，该技术与特斯拉的自动驾驶技术类似，有望带来数十亿美元的收入。【原文：General Motors is charting a technological future focused on its Super Cruise driver assistance technology, similar to Tesla's Autopilot, with the expectation of bringing in billions of dollars in revenue.】

item.title: 交易势头强劲，Blackstone 第四季度利润激增，资产管理规模创历史新高
item.description: 受交易回暖的推动，黑石集团周四公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，而这家全球最大的另类投资公司所管理的资产达到创纪录的 1.13 万亿美元。【原文：Blackstone trounced Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, fueled by a pickup in dealmaking, while the assets under management at the world's largest alternative investment firm reached a record $1.13 trillion.】

item.title: 报告显示，去年全球能源转型投资超过 2 万亿美元
item.description: 彭博全球环境基金（BloombergNEF）周四发布的一份报告显示，去年全球对低碳能源转型的投资首次超过 2 万亿美元。【原文：Global investment in low-carbon energy transition exceeded $2 trillion for the first time last year, a report by BloombergNEF showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 赛默飞工具和服务需求强劲，季度业绩超预期
item.description: 赛默飞世尔科技公司（Thermo Fisher Scientific）周四公布的第四季度利润和收入均超出华尔街预期，主要得益于其用于开发疗法的产品和服务需求的增长。【原文：Thermo Fisher Scientific on Thursday beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter profit and revenue, helped by improved demand for its products and services used in developing therapies.】

item.title: 军事装备需求激增，诺斯罗普实现季度盈利，去年同期为亏损
item.description: 美国国防公司诺斯罗普-格鲁曼（Northrop Grumman）周四公布，由于其B-21 "突袭者 "隐形轰炸机项目的不利因素有所缓解，以及地缘政治紧张局势加剧刺激了对其军事装备的需求，该公司实现了季度盈利，而去年同期为亏损。【原文：U.S. defense company Northrop Grumman posted a quarterly profit on Thursday, from a year-ago loss, as headwinds from its B-21 Raider stealth bomber program eased and rising geopolitical tensions stoked demand for its military equipment.】

item.title: 瓦莱罗能源公司成本下降，季度利润超出预期
item.description: 由于成本降低和可再生柴油利润率提高，炼油商瓦莱罗能源公司周四公布的第四季度利润超出预期。【原文：Refiner Valero Energy beat fourth-quarter profit estimates on Thursday, on lower costs and higher renewable diesel margins.】

item.title: 拉扎德第四季度利润因交易反弹而攀升
item.description: 投资银行拉扎德（Lazard）周四公布第四季度利润增长，主要得益于其咨询业务的强劲表现。【原文：Investment bank Lazard reported a rise in fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, helped by a strong performance in its advisory business.】

item.title: 设备需求不振，卡特彼勒第四季度利润下滑
item.description: 卡特彼勒周四公布第四季度利润下降，原因是受高借贷成本和持续通胀的影响，需求疲软导致经销商减少设备补货。【原文：Caterpillar reported a decline in fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, as dealers scaled back equipment restocking due to weak demand, driven by high borrowing costs and persistent inflation.】

item.title: 西南航空利润超预期，定价能力增强
item.description: 受强劲的旅游需求和机票价格上涨的影响，美国廉价航空公司西南航空公司周四公布的第四季度利润超过了华尔街的预期。【原文：U.S. budget carrier Southwest Airlines' fourth-quarter profit surpassed Wall Street estimates on Thursday, helped by robust travel demand and improved airfares.】

item.title: 特斯拉预计 2026 年和 2027 年资本支出将超过 110 亿美元
item.description: 特斯拉电动汽车公司在周四提交的一份文件中表示，预计今年及随后两个财年每年的资本支出将超过 110 亿美元。【原文：Tesla expects capital expenditure to exceed $11 billion this year and in each of the following two fiscal years, the electric automaker said in a filing on Thursday.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美联储暂停行动，大型股涨跌不一；接下来是欧洲央行降息和 GDP
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: UPS 预测 2025 年收入低于预期，股价下跌
item.description: 美国联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service）周四预计，2025 年的营收将低于华尔街的预期，原因是成本削减带来的收益被客户从利润更高的航空服务转向价格更低、速度更慢的地面递送服务所抵消。【原文：United Parcel Service on Thursday forecast 2025 revenue below Wall Street estimates, as gains from cost cuts were offset by customers opting for cheaper, slower ground-based deliveries from more profitable air-based services.】

item.title: 智利矿业公司 Codelco 将在 El Teniente 矿使用回收材料进行球磨
item.description: 智利国有矿业公司 Codelco 周四表示，将在其旗舰矿山 El Teniente 使用由回收材料制成的磨球，从而减少二氧化碳排放。【原文：Chilean state-owned miner Codelco said on Thursday it would use grinding balls made from recycled material in its flagship El Teniente mine, allowing it to reduce carbon dioxide emissions.】

item.title: 美联储维持利率稳定后，大盘股业绩推动美股期货走高
item.description: 在央行维持借贷成本不变一天后，美国股指期货周四走高，受 Meta 和特斯拉等大盘股财报后上涨的推动，本周还将有更多企业发布财报。【原文：U.S. stock index futures advanced on Thursday, a day after the central bank left borrowing costs unchanged, driven by post-earnings gains in megacaps including Meta and Tesla, with more corporate results to come through the week.】

item.title: 全球汽车业处于特朗普对墨西哥和加拿大关税威胁的火线上
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）承诺，如果墨西哥和加拿大在阻止芬太尼流入美国方面做得不够，他将从 2 月 1 日起对这两个国家的进口商品征收 25% 的关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump has pledged to place 25% tariffs on imports from Mexico and Canada from Feb. 1 if the two countries are not judged to be doing enough to stop the flow of fentanyl into the United States.】

item.title: 壳牌预计 2024 年油气储量替代率为 85
item.description: 壳牌周四表示，预计其去年的石油和天然气探明储量替代率为 85%。【原文：Shell said on Thursday it expects its proved oil and gas reserve replacement ratio for last year to be 85%.】

item.title: 秘鲁的美元高地让索尔货币在拉美同行中大放异彩
item.description: 秘鲁多年来经历了五任总统，并发生过致命的抗议活动，秘鲁索尔摆脱了政治动荡，成为拉丁美洲最稳定的货币。【原文：Peru's sol has become Latin America's most stable currency, shaking off political turmoil in the nation that's had five presidents in as many years and seen deadly protests.】

item.title: NHK 称，Seven & i 创始家族寻求泰国 Charoen Pokphand 在 MBO 中投资
item.description: 据日本 NHK 周四报道，Seven & i 的创始家族正要求泰国 Charoen Pokphand（CP）集团投资对这家日本零售巨头进行有管理的收购。【原文：The founding family of Seven & i is asking Thailand's Charoen Pokphand (CP) Group to invest in a managed buyout of the Japanese retailing giant, NHK reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道泰国央行行长警告：泰国经济可能因消费疲软而表现不佳
item.description: 泰国央行行长周四表示，尽管政府发放了现金以刺激疲软的经济增长，但第四季度的消费萎靡不振，经济增长弱于预期，因此泰国今年的经济增长率可能会低于2.9%。【原文：Thailand's economic growth may falter at under 2.9% this year on the back of a weaker-than-expected fourth quarter where consumption cratered despite a government cash handout aimed up firing up sluggish growth, the central bank chief said on Thursday.】

item.title: Molson Coors 以 8800 万美元收购英国 Fevertree 公司 8.5% 的股份
item.description: Coors Light 啤酒制造商 Molson Coors 公司周四表示，将以 7100 万英镑（8830 万美元）的价格收购英国 Fevertree Drinks 公司 8.5% 的股份，以扩大其在美国的非酒精饮料产品组合。【原文：Coors Light beer maker Molson Coors will take a 8.5% stake in UK's Fevertree Drinks for 71 million pounds ($88.3 million) to expand its portfolio of non-alcoholic beverage offerings in the U.S., the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 英国桑葚集团制定以英国和美国为重点的盈利计划
item.description: 英国奢侈品牌 Mulberry 集团周四公布了一项恢复盈利的计划，包括专注于英国市场，加快美国市场的增长，重新调整亚洲业务，减少对中国市场的重视。【原文：UK luxury brand Mulberry Group , on Thursday, unveiled a plan to return to profitability, including by focusing on the UK market, accelerating growth in the U.S. and re-align operations in Asia with reduced emphasis on China.】

item.title: 微软股价受云计算前景影响下滑；梅塔公司第四季度业绩超预期后股价上涨
item.description: 周四，微软股价在欧洲市场下跌，此前该公司发布了对其云业务的负面预测，而 Facebook 母公司 Meta 股价则在超出预期后上涨，原因是投资者对两家公司在人工智能方面的支出进行了仔细审查。【原文：Microsoft shares fell in Europe on Thursday after it issued a downbeat forecast for its cloud business, while Facebook parent Meta shares rose after beating expectations, as investors scrutinised the companies' spending on artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 尽管盈利不佳，特斯拉股价在法兰克福上涨
item.description: 特斯拉股价周四在法兰克福交易市场开盘上涨 3.6%，尽管这家美国电动汽车制造商的季度业绩没有达到华尔街的预期。【原文：Tesla shares opened up 3.6% in Frankfurt trading on Thursday, even as quarterly results at the U.S. electric vehicle maker fell short of Wall Street expectations.】

item.title: H&M 第四季度销售额因黑色星期五延迟而令人失望
item.description: 瑞典快速时尚零售商 H&M 周四公布的第四季度销售额低于预期，部分原因是 "黑色星期五"（Black Friday）迟到，但该公司表示，12 月和 1 月的销售额增长了 4%，表明新财年的开局较好。【原文：Swedish fast-fashion retailer H&M reported weaker-than-expected fourth-quarter sales on Thursday due in part to a late Black Friday, but said sales were up 4% in December and January, indicating a better start to the new fiscal year.】

item.title: 壳牌第四季度利润降至 36.6 亿美元；制定 35 亿美元股票回购计划
item.description: 周四，壳牌公布第四季度利润下降，原因是炼油利润下降和液化天然气（LNG）交易减少，使这家石油巨头遭受打击，壳牌还表示将回购价值 35 亿美元的股票。【原文：Shell reported a smaller fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, as the oil major took a hit from lower refining margins and lower liquefied natural gas (LNG) trading, and said it would buy back shares worth $3.5 billion.】
